display_name: Functional Outcomes of Sleep: Summary Score
description:
Summary Score of Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire. Range from 5 to 20. A higher score indicate better functional outcomes. [Weaver et. al, 1997 (Pubmed ID: 9415942)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9415942)

[Search for all Functional Outcomes of Sleep variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=fosq)
calculation: Set all negative values (ie. -44) to zero.  [[[(fosq_0100+ fosq_0200)/2] + [(fosq_0300+ fosq_0400+ fosq_0700)/3] + fosq_0500 + [(fosq_0600+ fosq_0800+ fosq_0900)/3] + fosq_1000]]] / 5 X 5
